snippet: Lou Lamoriello, the longtime general manager who has led the Devils to three Stanley Cup titles, was named to this year’s induction class of the United States Hockey Hall of Fame.
abstract: Lou Lamoriello, the longtime general manager who has led the New Jersey Devils to three Stanley Cup titles, is named to the 2012 induction class of the United States Hockey Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Lou Lamoriello, the longtime general manager who has led the Devils to three Stanley Cup titles, was named to this year’s induction class of the United States Hockey Hall of Fame.

headline.seo: Lou Lamoriello Headed to the Hall

keywords.value: United States Hockey Hall of Fame
